title: v5.1.0 â€“ Onboarding enforcement, admin user creation, avatars, modular FastAPI backend
body: Enforced onboarding flow across protected routes with step tracking and redirects.
AuthContext now manages onboarding state with updateOnboardingStep and completeOnboarding, persisted per user.
ProtectedRoute enforces onboarding and allows completion page view.
Admin: Add User modal on Customers page for internal user creation.
Avatars: License-safe set generated and integrated with avatar picker.
Backend (FastAPI): Modular structure, CORS, JWT auth, signup/login endpoints.
Account page: Change password flow (UI + backend).
Frontend API improvements: headers, token handling, error handling.
Fixes: bcrypt pin, CSV header for empty users file, modal outside-click issue.
